title: Understanding MSE
text: The Mental Status Exam (MSE) is a crucial tool in mental health assessments. It helps professionals evaluate various aspects of a person's mental functioning.

title: Components of MSE
text: The MSE typically includes assessments of appearance, behavior, mood, thought processes, cognition, and insight.

hintAnswer: an assessment tool used by mental health professionals to analyze an individual’s cognitive, emotional, and behavioral functioning
